message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.SY. 

The paper proposes a novel algorithm for achieving adversarial robustness in machine learning models, specifically deep neural networks. The algorithm is based on a saddle-point dynamical system and is deployed for the training of adversarially robust deep neural networks. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also involves computer vision (cs.CV) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) as it deals with deep neural networks and their robustness. Additionally, the paper involves optimization (cs.NE) as it formulates the robust learning problem as a robust optimization problem. Finally, the paper involves control systems (cs.SY) as it proposes a dynamical system-based framework for achieving adversarial robustness.
